import{combineReducers,createStore,applyMiddleware,compose}from"redux";import reducerProfile from"./Reducer-Profile";import reducerDialog from"./Reducer-Dialog";import reducerSideBar from"./Reducer-SideBar";import reducerUsers from"./Reducer-Users";import reducerAuth from"./Reducer-Auth";import thunkMiddleware from"redux-thunk";import{reducer as formReducer}from'redux-form';import reducerApp from"./Reducer-App";var reducers=combineReducers({ProfilePage:reducerProfile,DialogPage:reducerDialog,SideBar:reducerSideBar,usersPage:reducerUsers,Auth:reducerAuth,form:formReducer,app:reducerApp});var composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;var store=createStore(reducers,/* preloadedState, */composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(thunkMiddleware)));//let store = createStore(reducers, applyMiddleware(thunkMiddleware)) //первое создание reducers
window.__store=store;export default store;
